item.description:
Time: Monday, April 25 · 8:00pm - 9:00pm
Location: http://rawenergyradio.com/podcasts/category/hooked-on-raw
Created By: Rhio - Hooked on Raw
More Info: Join us as we interview Ken Rohla, a natural health educator certified by the Hippocrates Health Institute. Ken is also a researcher and you're gonna be surprised by some of the insights that he shares with us. Do you know that there are cars available right now that can run on water? Do you know that water has a fourth form? We know three: liquid, ice, and steam. But Ken says water also presents as a gas and this gas can even convert radioactive waste into elements that are non toxic. Have your pencil and paper ready as you're going to want to jot down some of this great information and websites given.

A *podcast is an audio file similar to a radio broadcast, which can be downloaded and listened to on a computer, mp3 player, mobile phone, etc.
item.name: FREE Podcast*: Ken Rohla
